subject: Missing Baseplate and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate in My Order
description_text:
Good evening,

I ordered from you the “Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and
Carbon Fiber Heel Plate” and the “VAM Pro Linear Motor (3 pack / includes
power supply)”.

Unfortunately, I did not receive the baseplate nor the carbon fiber heel
plate.

I hope these items are included in the bundle, as on your website it is not
specified whether they are included or not.

Based on the product preview images, I assumed that they were part of the
bundle.

How can we resolve this issue?

Thank you in advance and have a nice evening.

Best regards

Roberto

conversations.body_text: Hi roberto cottone,  No worries—please provide the order number starting with SSN, and I’ll check whether the items were shipped separately.
